WorkItem.Description:
I've noticed that Agility has a survival factor.  I've tried to isolate it, and it appears that it's because it contributes to armor still.  I believe that was removed with Cataclysm.  The only value of agility is to provide crit and 0.00328399% dodge (pre DR) per point.
Â 
Edited to avoid multiple posts.  I loaded a blank prot pally and gave him a random set of gloves.  Apply the +20 Agil enchant and watch him gain 40 armor.  Error does not persist in prot warrior or bear modules.

Comments.Message: Agility to Armor has been removed from all models in a single audit before .19 came out. Can you show me a character file where Agility is adding to armor?
I did a quick run down of the model, it seems Mongoose is still adding armor.  I've taken that out, but in the meantime, do please attach your character file.

When I attempted to pull down my character it glitched in an odd way with sockets but I tested it by finding an empty socket, adding a 40 agil gem, and watching armor increase by 80. A screenshot of it is at http://files1.guildlaunch.net/guild/library/144901/agility.png but it should be easily reproducible.
I think this is a good file.  Stick an agility gem in any open socket.

Found it:

"// Defensive Stats
            statsSpecialEffects.Armor = (float)Math.Floor(statsSpecialEffects.Armor * (1f + stats.BaseArmorMultiplier + statsSpecialEffects.BaseArmorMultiplier));
            statsSpecialEffects.BonusArmor += statsSpecialEffects.Agility * 2.0f;"
